name: Chess but worse
description:
This is my first Game Jam, I started out on 28/05/2022 thinking I could make a chess variant with a timer and other ideas. not bad for 2 days' work but nothing unique or original. For the 2 songs, one was made using loops and 1 midi using Mixcraft 9. I will probably carry on working on this till I make my original idea. 

Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-chess-set-board-and-time...

Source Code: https://github.com/SarahRawlinson/ChessLikeGame
